item.title: Israel calls up 60,000 reservists ahead of planned Gaza City offensive
item.description: Troops are already operating in some areas ahead of the planned operation, which the ICRC says will worsen "an already catastrophic situation".

item.title: Kremlin plays down Zelensky talks as Trump warns Putin may not want to make deal
item.description: The US president conceded the war in Ukraine was "tough to solve" after several days of high-level talks.

item.title: Man held after four bodies found in River Seine
item.description: A passer-by led French police to the grim discovery at the foot of a bridge south-east of Paris.

item.title: South Korea tells tourists on holiday island Jeju to behave
item.description: The island has issued visitor guidelines for the first time as it sees an increasing number of tourists.

item.title: Aerial footage shows final leg of Swedish church's move to new home
item.description: It took two days to move the church in Sweden's Kiruna, which was at risk at risk from ground subsidence.
